column10: b'Established in December 2000 WuXi AppTec is a leading global pharmaceutical biopharmaceutical and medical device open-access capability and technology platform with global operations. As an innovation-driven and customer- focused company WuXi AppTec provides a broad and integrated portfolio of services throughout the drug R&D process. Our services are designed to help our worldwide customers shorten the discovery and development time and lower the cost of drug and medical device R&D through cost-effective and efficient solutions. WuXi AppTec has successfully established a fully integrated services and technology platform during the past decade. The company built its initial capabilities around discovery chemistry and has further enhanced the integrated services with analytical services bio-analytical services process research process development services API manufacturing services DMPK/ADME discovery biology pharmacology formulation toxicology genomic services biologics manufacturing services antibody and biological research reagent manufacturing and sales and most recently clinical research and regulatory services. WuXi AppTec has developed from four founders and a single laboratory in December 2000 to 18000 employees and 6 million square feet of laboratory and manufacturing space including facilities under construction. column8: b'Company Description: PJM Interconnection is a regional transmission organization (RTO) that plays a vital role in the U.S. electric system.PJM ensures the reliability of the largest centrally dispatched control area in North America by coordinating the movement of electricity in all or parts of 13 states. PJM acting neutrally and independently operates the largest competitive wholesale electricity market in the world. PJM manages a sophisticated regional planning process for generation and transmission expansion to assure future electric reliability. PJM facilitates a collaborative stakeholder process. Stakeholders include participants that produce buy sell move and regulate electricity.'
column9: b"Department Description: The Transmission Planning Department coordinates the regional transmission planning process including assessing long term transmission system adequacy and reliability and evaluating and recommending bulk transmission system expansion or enhancement options. The department coordinates all expansion related activities within the pool including those associated with the interconnection of new generation resources and merchant transmission projects. The department is also responsible for a number of North American Electric Reliability Council (NERC) planning functions and represents the region on a range of inter-regional system studies. The planning process is accomplished in accordance with the planning criteria of several organizations including PJM NERC RFC (Reliability First Corporation) and SERC (SERC Reliability Corporation). The department promotes the development of new methods and the introduction of improved and emerging technologies. Departmental employees have an in-depth working knowledge of the PJM/NERC/RFC/SERC agreements planning criteria and operating instructions as they affect planning operation and analysis of the PJM system. ESSENTIAL DUTIES AND RESPONSIBILITIES: In support of PJM\xe2\x80\x99s Vision and Mission Transmission Planning Co-Op will support the objectives of the System Planning Division's power system analysis activities ensure accuracy of power system models and revise the models as necessary perform power systems analyses - such as load flows contingency studies and short circuit studies - and document analysis results. COMPETENCIES: \xe2\x80\xa2 Ability to effectively function within a team acknowledging protocols for team work assignments team accountability team leadership group dynamics group thinking processes and peer evaluations. \xe2\x80\xa2 Able to work in an efficient self-directed and independent manner on assigned projects Please note that this session runs from 9/24/2018 until 3/29/2019. If you cannot commit to employment for the session in its entirety and/or need to end the session earlier than the end date of 3/29/2019 please DO NOT apply."

column8: b'Company Description: PJM Interconnection is a regional transmission organization (RTO) that plays a vital role in the U.S. electric system.PJM ensures the reliability of the largest centrally dispatched control area in North America by coordinating the movement of electricity in all or parts of 13 states. PJM acting neutrally and independently operates the largest competitive wholesale electricity market in the world. PJM manages a sophisticated regional planning process for generation and transmission expansion to assure future electric reliability. PJM facilitates a collaborative stakeholder process. Stakeholders include participants that produce buy sell move and regulate electricity. Department Description: The Dispatching Department coordinates and directs the minute-to-minute operation of the PJM Control Area including generation dispatch transmission monitoring and control interchange transaction administration and generating unit scheduling. The Department maintains efficient and reliable operations while coordinating the bulk power system. In accordance with established reliability standards the following functions are performed: load estimating scheduling of generating units administrating the power interchange transactions with other systems pools and energy marketers dispatching of generating units monitoring and control of the loading on the bulk power transmission system and maintaining acceptable voltage profiles. The Dispatch Operation is responsible for not only operating the system in accordance with established operating procedures but provide insight into the development of those operating procedures policies and instructions. In times of emergency the Department is responsible for the implementation of the PJM Emergency Procedures.'
column9: b'Position Narrative: ESSENTIAL DUTIES AND RESPONSIBILITIES: (may involve any of the following): - Ability to understand the operational and technical aspects of PJM\xe2\x80\x99s Operations including various Transmission Modeling and Analysis assignments: Available Transfer Capability calculation OATF Inter-regional transmission studies etc. - Operating and supporting: electric system security (reliability) assessments facility ratings PSSe and EMS model development. - Ability to work with other members of the Operations Market Services and Performance division staff. - Ability to create and implement technical software solutions. - Ability to perform power system analysis and document results. column1: PJM Interconnection LLC (4021) Hiring Office Location: Norristown PA (1)
column8: b'Company Description: PJM Interconnection is a regional transmission organization (RTO) that plays a vital role in the U.S. electric system.PJM ensures the reliability of the largest centrally dispatched control area in North America by coordinating the movement of electricity in all or parts of 13 states. PJM acting neutrally and independently operates the largest competitive wholesale electricity market in the world. PJM manages a sophisticated regional planning process for generation and transmission expansion to assure future electric reliability. PJM facilitates a collaborative stakeholder process. Stakeholders include participants that produce buy sell move and regulate electricity. Department Description: The Transmission Service department is responsible for facilitating the transfer of power into out of and through PJM to neighboring portions of the Eastern Interconnection electrical grid. The Transmission Service department is primarily responsible for the determination of how much capacity is available to flow power to and from PJM\xe2\x80\x99s neighbors. Additionally department duties include the administration of in-house software applications such as the Open-Access Same-time Information System (OASIS) which is used by market participants to purchase Transmission Service; and ExSchedule which enables the utilization of Transmission Service via energy schedules. These programs assist PJM in its larger mission to maintain a stable and functional power market while also ensuring the grid operates in real-time as efficiently and safely as possible.'
column9: b'Essential duties and responsibilities (may involve any of the following): - Ability to understand the operational and technical aspects of PJM\xe2\x80\x99s Operations including various Transmission Modeling and Analysis assignments: Available Transfer Capability calculation Inter-regional transmission studies etc. - Supporting electric system analysis using power system analysis software (PSS/e MUST TARA). - Assisting members of the Operations Market Services Planning and Performance division staff. - Assisting in creation and/or testing of software solutions. - Perform power system analysis and document results under the guidance of senior engineers. CHARACTERISTICS AND QUALIFICATIONS: The requirements listed above are representative of the knowledge skill and/or ability required. Reasonable accommodations may be made to enable individuals with disabilities to perform the essential functions. Please note that this session runs from 9/24/2018 until 3/29/2019. If you cannot commit to employment for the session in its entirety and/or need to end the session earlier than the end date of 3/29/2019 please DO NOT apply.'
column10: b'No'
column14: b'Professional skills & opportunities gained: - Experience using exclusive software (PSS/e MUST TARA EMS). - Gain business experience by supporting critical engineering tasks. - Strengthen teamwork skills by working with Transmission Service Engineers. - Obtain an understanding of wholesale power markets and how the power grid is maintained. - Access to various training courses. Required: - Ability to communicate (written and verbal) effectively. - Ability to visualize and solve complex problems. - Strong analytical skills and attention to detail. - Ability to work closely with peers in a teamwork environment. - Ability to learn the power system analysis tools used in the industry and develop results reports under the guidance of senior engineers.'

column1: MilkCrate (133930) Hiring Office Location: Philadelphia
column3: Digital Product + Graphic Design Intern/Philadelphia PA ($1000 stipend)
column9: b"Kind of like a fitbit for doing good - MilkCrate's platform engages tracks and rewards people for completing 'impact' challenges. We work with corporations schools nonprofits and real estate groups in creating customized game like apps that track and grow the social and or environmental of these large groups Companies like Comcast license our technology to engage employees and track their verified impact behavior. This helps them save resources create a values-driven culture and develop a more impact focused brand. Similarly when Real Estate groups offer MilkCrate to tenants they earn additional points on GRESB increasing the value of their assets and adding value to renters. Nonprofits can track their grant funded programs while generating revenue by monetizing their audiences as they complete sponsored challenges. Since our 2014 launch MilkCrate has received invites to the White House to discuss climate change pitched on the Forbes Under 30 stage were recognized as Startup of the Year and even earned praise from the UN Foundation."
column10: b'Your role will be to help create assets for our product development and marketing efforts. We have had 3 years of success with this role helping young designers tackling exciting real world projects. Most recently we had a Drexel Co-op who was empowered to overhaul our website design and learned wordpress to rebuild it. She was given resources and training to build a great product for her portfolio and is now applying to graduate school based on her work. In this role you will be a part of a team of other interns lead by our Product Manager and Client Success Manager. You will also have a regular one on one meeting with our CEO to make sure your internship is meeting your own learning objectives. Responsibilities for the Marketing and Graphic Design Intern include: Asset creation for our social media accounts and newsletter Asset creation for our digital products including the app and admin website Asset creation for our webpage mymilkcrate.com Digital and print ads and posters Fabricated materials primarily for web like signs and banners Perks: Flexible work hours Ability to learn more about the industry and gain startup experience Casual and fun work environment Downtown office location (easy and accessible via public transportation)'
column15: b'\xe2\x80\xa2 Must be proficient in Adobe CC \xe2\x80\xa2 HTML/CSS is a plus \xe2\x80\xa2 Examples of work via a portfolio is required for qualification.'

column8: b'Company Description: PJM Interconnection is a regional transmission organization (RTO) that plays a vital role in the U.S. electric system.PJM ensures the reliability of the largest centrally dispatched control area in North America by coordinating the movement of electricity in all or parts of 13 states. PJM acting neutrally and independently operates the largest competitive wholesale electricity market in the world. PJM manages a sophisticated regional planning process for generation and transmission expansion to assure future electric reliability. PJM facilitates a collaborative stakeholder process. Stakeholders include participants that produce buy sell move and regulate electricity. Department Description: The office of the Sr. Director of Physical Security and Facilities Services at PJM is responsible for establishing and maintaining the physical security measures at the offices of PJM. Access to PJM buildings and internal segments of buildings is controlled by the Physical Security manager and his staff through the use of computerized physical security access control systems. These reader systems are in secure locations and access to them is limited to authorized individuals. The systems have the ability to provide differential access to individuals at PJM based on their job responsibilities. PJM employs an onsite contract security officer service for its Valley Forge & Milford facility. The security service monitors activity on the campus around the clock. The PJM facilities are also monitored with video equipment on a 24x7 basis.'
column9: b'GENERAL POSITION SUMMARY: The Physical Security Co- op/Intern will assist in maintaining a safe and secure working environment to protect the physical facilities assets and employees of PJM Interconnection. Under the direction of the Physical Security Manager and the Sr. Security Analyst the Co-op/Intern aides in establishing coordinating and implementing appropriate safety practices as dictated by federal or state legislative requirements and/or independent PJM Interconnection needs through the use of effective security initiative programs. ESSENTIAL DUTIES AND RESPONSIBILITIES: \xe2\x80\xa2 Assist to meet and maintain a safe and secure working environment to protect the physical facilities assets and employees of the PJM Interconnection. \xe2\x80\xa2 Assist all of security department\xe2\x80\x99s efforts related to physical site security/protection \xe2\x80\xa2 Review and obtain a working knowledge of the physical security program as it relates to access control systems IP based video recording systems and photo ID badging system mass notification systems and visitor management. \xe2\x80\xa2 Assist with daily weekly quarterly reports and metrics programs. \xe2\x80\xa2 Assist in security/safety inspections threat assessments security assessments and physical site surveys of all PJM facilities. \xe2\x80\xa2 Review physical security protocols for personnel assets facilities and property and implement proactive measures to mitigate PJM\xe2\x80\x99s exposures to vulnerability and risk. \xe2\x80\xa2 Liaison with multiple departments coordinating physical security related issues with such specified departments. \xe2\x80\xa2 Liaison between PJM\xe2\x80\x99s proprietary/contracted Security Officers Security Analyst and security consulting services. \xe2\x80\xa2 Under the direction of the Physical Security Manager and/or the Sr. Security Analyst assist update physical security implementation plans proprietary/contract security plans security equipment requirements and training/awareness programs. \xe2\x80\xa2 Become familiar with SSAE 16 NERC CIP Standards and internal compliance guidelines. \xe2\x80\xa2 Expand and maintain utility industry physical security contacts affiliations & liaisons. \xe2\x80\xa2 Assist with investigations including but not limited to system breaches employees concerns complaints and or any Human Resources department requests. \xe2\x80\xa2 Assist in all physical security projects including the development of project plans and resource assessments for the PJM environment. \xe2\x80\xa2 Build and develop strong relationships with PJM\xe2\x80\x99s internal customers by providing superior customer support as demonstrated by resolving issues being responsive to needs requirements and deadlines; and generally promoting goodwill in a professional and trust-building manner. \xe2\x80\xa2 Work independently in pursuit of departmental goals and objectives with little or no specific direction. \xe2\x80\xa2 Demonstrate integrity in decision-making.'

Department Description: The Reliability Compliance department is responsible for coordinating the reliable planning and operation of the PJM Interconnection in accordance with the NERC and Regional Entities Reliability Standards and NAESB Business Practices. The department is also responsible for providing technical support and guidance to the Compliance Division other PJM Divisions and PJM member companies in addressing Reliability Standards compliance. The Department meets these responsibilities by participating in the NERC and Regional standards drafting processes participating and coordinating with industry committees and working groups monitoring compliance activities and working with PJM member companies in support of shared compliance efforts.'

column1: Kieran Timberlake (114335) Hiring Office Location: Philadelphia
column9: b'KieranTimberlake is seeking a Software Developer Intern to join our Philadelphia office. Composed of nearly 120 professionals with diverse backgrounds and abilities our design practice is recognized worldwide. With equal emphasis placed on research and the built environment our projects include the programming planning and design of master plans and new buildings; the conservation renovation and transformation of existing buildings; the development of application-specific environmental analysis and prediction tools; building and environmental monitoring; and novel building and envelope assemblies. We have special expertise in education government arts and culture civic and residential projects but common to all our work is the principle that each project begins with a question and continues its development within a culture of research. By ensuring that design results from deep investigation our transdisciplinary design process inspires creativity and fosters a culture of sharing ideas knowledge and techniques.'
column10: b'The Software Development (SD) Intern will reside within the KieranTimberlake Research Group a highly collaborative and transdisciplinary entity that requires its members to work well within in a social environment. Working within this multidisciplinary team the SD Intern will develop refine prototype and test software tools targeted at architects seeking environmental performance data that substantiates design decisions. In addition to having excellent oral and written communication skills the SD Intern will be expected to fully document his or her work and communicate progress to internal audiences including product development teams in a cogent manner. Additionally the successful candidate will have a demonstrated ability to set a development plan including deliverables on his or her own schedule and will also have the proven capacity to estimate and meet the time requirements for each assigned task. In creating such a plan however the SD Intern will need to work with other team members to ensure his or her deliverables are fully compatible and integrated with those of the greater software development team.'

column9: b'Magna-Power designs and manufactures robust programmable power products in the USA that set industry standards for quality size and control. The company\xe2\x80\x99s experience in power electronics is reflected in its 1.25 kW to 2000 kW+ product line quality service and reputation for excellence. Today you will find Magna-Power\xe2\x80\x99s standard products at its thousands of customers worldwide aiding in the manufacture of electric vehicles simulating solar arrays for development of inverters steering magnets for particle accelerators powering radar systems driving traction controllers for locomotive development or at a wide range of Universities for cutting-edge energy research.'
column10: b'Magna-Power Electronics (www.magna-power.com) a leader in High- Power DC Power Supplies located in Flemington New Jersey (NJ) is currently seeking a full-time Software Intern to help build and improve our production software and tool chaining written in Python. The primary summer task is to develop automated tests for our new product MagnaLOAD using our in-house unit test framework. The Intern will work under the guidance of seasoned programmers and engineers and every line of code will be carefully reviewed before releasing into production. We have numerous other projects including converting our issue tracking system from Mantis to Jira writing data extraction programs to help guide our industrial robots like our six axis robot arms and pick and place machines. We are also looking for assistance porting our current Intel Edison Arduino Embedded Linux software to Raspberry Pi. Specific duties will include: \xe2\x80\xa2 Manipulate Postgre Databases. \xe2\x80\xa2 Python Unit Test Framework \xe2\x80\xa2 Interfacing with Data Acquisition Equipment \xe2\x80\xa2 Serial Communications \xe2\x80\xa2 Data Parsing (regular expressions) \xe2\x80\xa2 Code Review Process \xe2\x80\xa2 Issue Tracking (Jira Mantis) \xe2\x80\xa2 Familiarity with version control (SVN GIT) a plus.'

column1: TherapyNotes LLC (4030) Hiring Office Location: Horsham
column9: b"With over 31000 active users TherapyNotes is the national leader in providing web-based behavioral health practice management and electronic health records software to private practices psychologists therapists counselors social workers and psychiatrists. Over the past 4 years we have more than tripled in size and we're continuing to grow rapidly. Our 50 person team recently moved into a newly renovated office space in Horsham PA (you can read more here: https://blog.therapynotes.com/new-therapynotes-corporate-offices). Our team of software developers IT support specialists and business professionals are dedicated to providing our customers with the best electronic medical records software experience. The TherapyNotes product integrates patient scheduling medical records billing and electronic claims to streamline the way mental health professionals manage their practice. TherapyNotes offers careers that provide you with the freedom to do amazing work interact with great people and offer fantastic learning and growth opportunities. The company is founded and led by a Drexel alum and several of our current employees are Drexel graduates and former co-ops."
column10: b"We're looking for a candidate eager for an opportunity to work in a highly collaborative fast-paced Agile environment with teammates focused on delivering timely working software that delivers business value and helps our company to grow. Build experience in your field while performing work that really matters. We are heavily invested in our co-ops and interns and believe that your experience should be a rewarding one. That's why you're provided with a mentor day 1 on the job and you have access to several other junior and senior level development professionals who are more than happy to help you learn. Our team will mold responsibilities based on your performance so you could be tasked with assignments or projects that are at a comparable level of difficulty to those that our junior developers are responsible for. Some of the essential duties and responsibilities include: (1) Full-stack development including application database and front end layers; (2) Web application development and code review utilizing modern web technologies including ASP.NET C# AJAX SQL etc.; (3) Full development life cycle from planning through successful release and support."
column15: b'You should have experience in some or all of the following technologies: C# (or other object-oriented programming language such as Java Ruby or C++) JavaScript CSS HTML SQL ASP.NET Ruby on Rails or PHP. You should also exhibit excellent communication skills problem solving skills attention to detail and strong knowledge of version control and object-oriented concepts. You should be passionate for working in a collaborative entrepreneurial team-oriented Agile environment. Experience working with Oracle or other relational databases is a plus.'

column1: Amazon.com (44980) Hiring Office Location: Seattle
column3: Software Development Engineer Co-op / Seattle WA
column9: b'Amazon is guided by four principles: customer obsession rather than competitor focus passion for invention commitment to operational excellence and long-term thinking. Customer reviews 1-Click shopping personalized recommendations Prime Fulfillment by Amazon AWS Kindle Direct Publishing Kindle Fire tablets Fire TV Amazon Echo and Alexa are some of the products and services pioneered by Amazon.'
column10: b"We are hiring innovative Software Development Engineer interns into our technical development teams at our headquarters in Seattle WA. Our interns and co-ops write real software and partner with a select group of experienced software development engineers who both help and challenge them as they work on projects that matter to our customers. You\xe2\x80\x99ll be given the opportunity to have direct impact on the evolution of Amazon's technologies and lead mission critical projects early in your career. Your design code and raw smarts will contribute to solving some of the most complex technical challenges in the areas of distributed systems data mining optimization scalability and security-- just to name a few. Many of our technologies overlap\xe2\x80\x94you\xe2\x80\x99d be hard pressed to find a team that isn\xe2\x80\x99t using Amazon Web Services (AWS) touching the catalogue or iterating services to better personalize for the customer. Below is a small snapshot of potential work content provided to give you some of big ideas you could work with at Amazon. Retail The software we write and the systems we own enable over 50 million customers worldwide to order anything from a pin to a piano with the click of a mouse! Every aspect of our business interacts with our systems. We're the hub of Amazon's massive worldwide service- oriented architecture. Devices Amazon has produced groundbreaking devices like Fire tablets Fire TV Kindles and the Amazon Echo. What will you help us create? You will engage with an experienced cross-disciplinary staff to conceive design and bring to market innovative devices and services. We work with an internal interdisciplinary team and outside partners to drive key aspects of product definition execution and test. AWS AWS is a unique place where you can design and build innovative technologies in a very large distributed computing environment and help lead fundamental changes in the industry. We build distributed storage index and query systems that are scalable fault-tolerant low cost and easy to manage and use. These are exciting times in our space \xe2\x80\x93 we are growing fast but still at an early stage and working on ambitious new initiatives where an engineer at any level can have significant technical and business impact. We\xe2\x80\x99re looking for developers with a passion for solving difficult problems in distributed systems high performance storage systems and database internals \xe2\x80\x93 experience with parallel query processing distributed caching or transaction processing are all big pluses. Recommendations Amazon tailors customer recommendations through a variety of machine learning and heuristic based algorithms that you can help shape. Not only will you be exposed to the cutting edge of machine learning research you'll also be creating services to run these predictions on distributed systems at incredible scale and speed. You will spend your time as a hands-on engineer. You will play a key role in building software products and features from the ground up. You will use a wide range of technologies programming languages and systems. Your responsibilities will include all aspects of software development. Fulfillment and Operations Fulfillment is at the heart of the Amazon experience. We deliver millions of products to hundreds of countries worldwide. With more than 123 Fulfillment Centers globally Amazon Fulfillment is growing at a pace that requires the best and brightest talent to be brought in to our company to help us continue to make history. We manage the software and infrastructure which powers Amazon\xe2\x80\x99s world-class fulfillment engine. We work on automation machine vision robotics and machine learning. Our data and services support Amazon catalog inventory and labor management systems. These systems constitute the backbone of Amazon ranging from the tens of millions of items in the catalog hundreds of millions of items of inventory to billions of transactions a year! Every item that comes into the fulfillment center and is delivered to a customer moves through our platform. We take ownership for what we do \xe2\x80\x93 whether we\xe2\x80\x99re developing a new technology in-house or launching a new Fulfillment Center. New Projects and Expansions New countries new products new teams. Amazon is always innovating on behalf of our customers. By joining a team within this group your code would add value to the next frontier of Pioneering at Amazon."
column15: b"BASIC QUALIFICATIONS \xc2\xb7 Currently enrolled in a Bachelor\xe2\x80\x99s or Master\xe2\x80\x99s degree program in Computer Science Computer Engineering or related technical discipline with a focus on software development \xc2\xb7 Currently enrolled in university with graduation dates starting March 2019 and onward \xc2\xb7 Able to work full-time (40 hrs/week) PREFERRED QUALIFICATIONS \xc2\xb7 Currently enrolled in a Bachelor's program in Computer Science \xc2\xb7 Possess permanent authorization to work in the U.S. \xc2\xb7 Strong understanding of object-oriented design data structures and algorithms \xc2\xb7 Proficient in one or more object-orientated programming languages (Java C C++ etc) \xc2\xb7 Ability to effectively articulate technical challenges and solutions \xc2\xb7 Adept at handling ambiguous or undefined challenges through strong problem solving abilities and effective communication Amazon is an Equal Opportunity-Affirmative Action Employer \xe2\x80\x93 Minority / Female / Disability / Veteran / Gender Identity / Sexual Orientation"

column1: Drexel University (1874) Hiring Office Location: Philadelphia
column9: b'The Expressive and Creative Interaction Technologies (ExCITe) Center was established in 2013 as a University-wide strategic initiative for research innovation. The Center pursues activities advancing transdisciplinary research and discovery connecting technology and communities. Visit drexel.edu/excite for more information.'
column10: b'The ExCITe Center seeks a student with a passion for technology creative expression and community engagement. We are particularly interested in candidates who have prior experience developing and working with new technology (computing digital media engineering and making) but who also have artistic interests and pursuits (music visual arts dance and/or product design). As a Creative Technologist you will work to develop unique projects combining art and design with state-of-the-art technology in an environment that encourages exploration and collaborative learning. Collaborators could include professional artists designers industry partners community members other students and faculty. In this role you will have the opportunity to assist in initiatives with Rebrand Cities which is a national effort assisting small businesses create a stronger digital presence by building/updating their websites. Past projects for this role have included developing novel musical interfaces for audience engagement building autonomous drones for dance performance and discovering useful integrations of cutting- edge technology in the field of education. The Creative Technologist will be part of the dynamic ExCITe Center community working together at the intersection of technology design and entrepreneurship helping to support and grow these efforts. This work may include working off-site and some non- traditional hours. - Coordinate and implement new and ongoing projects with a range of community and artistic collaborators. - Develop solutions to complex problems integrating new technology processes and methods from a range of disciplines. - Develop detailed project plan(s) to monitor and track development progress. -Assist in the definition of scope and objectives for new projects with internal and external collaborators. - Create and maintain comprehensive project documentation and communicate ongoing development externally (website and blog). - Author media (graphics web audio and text) to support project communications. - Assist in organizing high-profile public events including audio and visual technical support. - Support relationships with collaborators both internal and external to ExCITe.'
column15: b'- Ability to work independently towards long-term project goals. - A commitment to rapid prototyping and iteration of projects for relentless improvement. - Familiarity with some programming languages. column8: b'PJM Interconnection is a regional transmission organization (RTO) that plays a vital role in the U.S. electric system. PJM ensures the reliability of the largest centrally dispatched control area in North America by coordinating the movement of electricity in all or parts of 13 states. PJM acting neutrally and independently operates the largest competitive wholesale electricity market in the world. PJM manages a sophisticated regional planning process for generation and transmission expansion to assure future electric reliability. Department Description: The Market Efficiency Department is responsible for regional market efficiency analyses as required by PJM\xe2\x80\x99s planning function. PJM\xe2\x80\x99s market efficiency activities include assessing long term regional transmission system adequacy and efficiency identifying the limiting elements and evaluating the market impact of transmission system upgrades or enhancement options.'
column9: b'The Co-op Market Efficiency supports members of the Market Efficiency group in performing market simulations learning new technologies quantifying economic benefits of transmission upgrades to the bulk electric system analyzing powerflow data creating high level reports in Excel and Access and maintaining the Market Efficiency database used for economic transmission planning. Benefits of this position: This position will provide the candidate a basic understanding of the PJM electricity market and PJM planning processes. The student will gain valuable insight on topics such as bulk electric system powerflow analysis using PSS/E and PowerWorld flowgates congestion market simulation using PROMOD engineering economics Python and VBA programming business analytics. The Co-op Market Efficiency responsibilities will include but are not limited to the following: \xe2\x80\xa2 Support the Market Efficiency team in developing and maintaining the PROMOD database used for economic transmission planning. \xe2\x80\xa2 Analyze and correct the inputs to the PROMOD market models as necessary using PSS/E PowerWorld. \xe2\x80\xa2 Map PROMOD input data to PJM OASIS and PJM EMS data. \xe2\x80\xa2 Process outputs from the market modeling software PROMOD IV using Excel macros Excel VBA or Python programming code \xe2\x80\xa2 Analyze data and support the Market Efficiency staff in conducting economic analyses for proposed transmission upgrades. \xe2\x80\xa2 Use Energy Velocity data analysis tools to draw conclusions regarding benefits to the electric system changes in load payments and adjusted production costs. \xe2\x80\xa2 Perform contingency analysis Please note that this session runs from 9/24/2018 until 3/29/2019. If you cannot commit to employment for the session in its entirety and/or need to end the session earlier than the end date of 3/29/2019 please DO NOT apply.'

column9: b'\xe2\x80\xa2The principle job responsibilities of the RTDM co- op are: Graphical power station diagram creation and editing on a daily basis in response to both internal and external requests. Bulk display editing in support of quarterly model updates in coordination with various other departments. Specialty display creation as required by PJM Dispatch. \xe2\x80\xa2Research and implement TERM (Transmission Equipment Ratings Monitor) tickets using both eDart and the EMS database. This requires communication with other departments within PJM as well as our member companies. \xe2\x80\xa2The student working with the guidance of an engineer and data analyst will be given specific assignments on these systems which are needed to provide accurate and valid snapshots of the bulk transmission power system for the PJM dispatchers to monitor. column1: PJM Interconnection LLC (4021) Hiring Office Location: Norristown PA (1)
column8: b'Company Description: PJM Interconnection is a regional transmission organization (RTO) that plays a vital role in the U.S. electric system.PJM ensures the reliability of the largest centrally dispatched control area in North America by coordinating the movement of electricity in all or parts of 13 states. PJM acting neutrally and independently operates the largest competitive wholesale electricity market in the world. PJM manages a sophisticated regional planning process for generation and transmission expansion to assure future electric reliability. PJM facilitates a collaborative stakeholder process. Stakeholders include participants that produce buy sell move and regulate electricity. Department Description: The Generation Department in the Operations Planning Division supports Dispatch in the operation of PJM members\xe2\x80\x99 generation fleet and supports the needs of PJM\xe2\x80\x99s generation owners in meeting their goals and objectives. The Generation Department includes PJM\xe2\x80\x99s subject matter experts on generation operation activities support for generator operational data requirements resolution of operational issues generation outage coordination generation performance monitoring hydro scheduling coordination forecast applications for load forecasting wind power and solar forecasting automatic generation control (AGC) support generation related ancillary market support including regulation and black start services and nuclear generation coordination. Generation Department staff is also actively engaged in coordination of generation resource compliance issues leading PJM\xe2\x80\x99s gas / electric coordination efforts and development of PJM\xe2\x80\x99s operations approach to Distributed Energy Resources.'
column9: b'Position Narrative: Working in the Generation Dept. provides the opportunity to learn a basic understanding of various types of generation e.g. gas nuclear coal hydro wind etc. and also gives the co-op an opportunity to learn about the operation and maintenance of units which includes testing and validating generator information. The generation department also introduces the co-op to the wholesale electricity market. While the co-op will not be working with markets directly while in the Generation department they will coordinate with other departments to gather operational parameter information related to generator performance. The student may also have the opportunity to accompany senior staff on site visits to generation and interconnection projects. This would allow the prospective co-op student the ability to see first-hand the type of equipment that is being modeled and analyzed. Essential Duties & Responsibilities: Co-ops will be working with a team of about 10 engineers. \xe2\x80\xa2Co-ops have several daily tasks but most of their time will be focused on assisting the engineers within the Generation Department. \xe2\x80\xa2Co-ops will work with other departments and teams such as Real Time Data Management Transmission Operations Dispatch Outage Analysis Technologies and Model Management. \xe2\x80\xa2Student will learn to gather process and analyze data gathered from a variety of sources. PJM allows the co-op to learn to utilize tools that are used industry wide as well as in other applications that extend beyond the power industry. o SQL is used extensively to access information stored in databases. The co-op will be able to look at unit and outage information using this tool. o OSI PI System (PI ProcessBook PI AF and PI DataLink) will be used to gather performance data on units and create displays for internal use. o VBA will be used to automate tasks in Excel and speed up the analysis of data. o Using EMS (Energy Management System) to analyze generator locations and station configuration. o Past co-ops have also learned Java or Python for certain tasks. \xe2\x80\xa2Co-ops are encouraged to ask questions if they are having trouble understanding their work and are expected to communicate with other Generation Dept staff on workload coordination in order to ensure that co-op resources are being fully utilized. \xe2\x80\xa2Co-ops have some freedom to pursue work they find interesting through additional projects if approved. Please note that this session runs from 9/24/2018 until 3/29/2019. If you cannot commit to employment for the session in its entirety and/or need to end the session earlier than the end date of 3/29/2019 please DO NOT apply.'

column8: b"Girard is a full-scholarship boarding school for academically capable students from qualified families of limited financial resources. column3: Trade Operations Co-op / Bala Cynwyd PA
column9: b'SIG is a global quantitative trading firm. We commit our own capital to trade derivatives commodities and equities including options futures ETFs bonds and other financial products around the world. We are a place where smart analytical people work together to profitably trade in uncertain markets. With over 1500 employees across four continents SIG has developed respected businesses in Trading Institutional Sales Research and Private Equity. SIG began its relationship with Drexel\xe2\x80\x99s Co-op Program soon after the firm\xe2\x80\x99s inception in 1987. Today SIG continues to be a top employer for the program hiring up to 25 co-op students each cycle. The SIG Co-op Program gives you an opportunity to apply what you learn in class to real world business scenarios. Co-op students are placed in teams based on their preferences major background and skills as well as SIG\xe2\x80\x99s most critical business needs.'
column10: b'Trade Operations co-ops are integrated into our dynamic environment by managing many of the fast-paced responsibilities of our trading desks. These co-ops work directly with full-time traders and operations associates to ensure that the desk is operating efficiently by monitoring all aspects of trade submission settlement and profit and loss calculation. As a trade operations co-op you will gain firsthand exposure to the market trends and overall economic environment during your six months at SIG. Job duties include but are not limited to: \xe2\x80\xa2 Communicating with satellite offices and exchanges about trades \xe2\x80\xa2 Tracking and correcting trade breaks \xe2\x80\xa2 Running macros that update data used in profit and loss reports \xe2\x80\xa2 Entering trade tickets throughout the day \xe2\x80\xa2 Sending hourly and final recaps of trades \xe2\x80\xa2 Running evening macros to update trade records \xe2\x80\xa2 Using technical and financial acumen to improve existing operations processes Financial and Trading operations co-ops may deal with one of the following business areas: \xe2\x80\xa2 Convertible Bonds\xe2\x80\x93 Bonds that can be converted into a predetermined amount of stock \xe2\x80\xa2 Equity Finance\xe2\x80\x93 The borrowing and lending of equities \xe2\x80\xa2 Equity Options\xe2\x80\x93 The right to buy or sell an underlying security at a fixed price \xe2\x80\xa2 Index\xe2\x80\x93 Trades related to indices which quantify the value of a particular set of securities \xe2\x80\xa2 Fixed Income\xe2\x80\x93 Products including bonds futures ETFs and OTC derivatives \xe2\x80\xa2Institutional Brokerage\xe2\x80\x93 Customer facing broker dealer arm working with equities ETFs options and bonds Co-op Perks: \xe2\x80\xa2 Relaxed dress code (jeans and sneakers are the norm) \xe2\x80\xa2 Discounts for shopping travel dining entertainment and attractions \xe2\x80\xa2 Co-op education classes designed to teach you more about SIG and the financial industry \xe2\x80\xa2 Company-wide outings and social events including a poker tournament baseball game and 5K races \xe2\x80\xa2 A 9000 square-foot gym and on-site yoga classes \xe2\x80\xa2 On-site services such as dry cleaning and laundry auto repair and detailing and ATM'
column15: b'\xe2\x80\xa2 Proficiency in Microsoft Office suite specifically Excel and Access \xe2\x80\xa2 Proficiency with VBA and/or SQL a plus \xe2\x80\xa2 Strong communication skills (oral and written); ability to interact effectively with all levels of the organization and external vendors \xe2\x80\xa2 Detail oriented; ability to handle multiple tasks in a fast paced environment \xe2\x80\xa2 Must be a self-starter a quick learner and resourceful in solving problems \xe2\x80\xa2 Previous experience in the financial services industry or completion of finance- or investment-related coursework a plus \xe2\x80\xa2 Probability and Statistics background a plus'

column1: PJM Interconnection LLC (4021) Hiring Office Location: Norristown PA (1)
column8: b'Company Description: PJM Interconnection is a regional transmission organization (RTO) that plays a vital role in the U.S. electric system. PJM ensures the reliability of the largest centrally dispatched control area in North America by coordinating the movement of electricity in all or parts of 13 states. PJM acting neutrally and independently operates the largest competitive wholesale electricity market in the world. PJM manages a sophisticated regional planning process for generation and transmission expansion to assure future electric reliability. PJM facilitates a collaborative stakeholder process. Stakeholders include participants that produce buy sell move and regulate electricity. Department Overview: IT Service Management and Compliance is comprised of two teams. The Service Management team is a team of Service Analysts with the capability to analyze document measure and provide visibility to the services supporting the PJM Mission. The services provided are as follows: IT Asset Management: Managing the lifecycle of all IT Assets (servers network devices PCs) from installation to disposal. IT Procurement: Purchasing all hardware and software and handling all maintenance renewals. Configuration Management: Understanding and documenting the relationships between IT assets and their configurations to understand impact. Datacenter: Managing the installation of all hardware in the datacenter. Service Delivery: Automating servers such as server builds using our service catalog workflow tool. The Compliance department is responsible for the oversight and coordination of all compliance-related functions for the Information Technology & Services division. Responsibilities include monitoring computer systems for unauthorized changes & scanning computer systems to ensure they meet our compliance standards.'
column9: b'Essential duties and responsibilities of the position may involve any of the following: \xe2\x80\xa2 IT Asset Management duties include IT asset collection hardware lifecycle updates training documentation creation and auditing of datacenter hardware \xe2\x80\xa2 Cross-functional interaction and opportunities to work with teams across the IT organization. \xe2\x80\xa2 Assisting in data analysis activities for various projects and initiatives as required \xe2\x80\xa2 Administrative duties include scheduling meetings creating meeting agendas and capturing meeting minutes. \xe2\x80\xa2 Assisting the Data Center coordinator with racking and un-racking of assets. \xe2\x80\xa2 Learning and utilizing several security and compliance software packages \xe2\x80\xa2 Assisting in data analysis activities for various projects and initiatives as required \xe2\x80\xa2 Cross-functional interaction and opportunities to work with teams across the IT organization \xe2\x80\xa2 Performing as-needed security scans and reporting Please note that this session runs from 9/24/2018 until 3/29/2019. If you cannot commit to employment for the session in its entirety and/or need to end the session earlier than the end date of 3/29/2019 please DO NOT apply.'

column1: Blackfynn (147942) Hiring Office Location: Philadelphia (1)
column8: b'Blackfynn (www.blackfynn.com) is a life sciences software startup building a data platform which integrates complex scientific and clinical data to enable therapeutics for neurologic disease. To improve the lives of those impacted access to and collaboration around this data needs to be vastly improved. To achieve these goals we need passionate bright collaborative problem-solvers who want to use their skills and talents to make a positive impact on the world.'
column9: b'Blackfynn is looking for a talented engineering co-op to join our platform team. We\'re a group of engineers and designers tackling tough problems at the intersection of scientific data and analysis. Engineers on the team design build and scale infrastructure capabilities and features across our data platform. We appreciate healthy debate curiosity transparency and getting things done. Above all else we\'re looking for people who are mission driven and wish to use their talents to make meaningful impacts on people\'s lives. What You\xe2\x80\x99ll Learn As an engineer on our team you\'ll learn how to be an engineer on our team. Said differently co-ops are no different than any other member of the team. You\'ll participate in designing the technical aspects of a feature building the feature in the platform and ultimately deploying them to production. You\'ll be surrounded by individuals who have no egos enjoy helping each other grow and care deeply about building a great product. About Our Stack Our code is functional well tested thoughtfully designed and well structured. We view software development as a craft. We care deeply about user experience in a field where it is often lacking. We\'re not language or library zealots we\'re "right tool for the job" people. We value good engineering above all us. We\'re interested in co-ops who can work on a team and take the complex tasks our users perform and distill them down to intuitive experiences. Currently the platform contains these main components. First is the processing engine which takes scientific data and processes it using a state of the art linux container stack managed on AWS. Once the data has been processed it is linked to other data through our graph database and eventually displayed to our users through a single page front end app written in Vue.js. These and other systems are connected through the middleware stack which is written in functional style Scala microservices. Today our stack includes: * Languages: Scala Python Javascript * Frameworks & Libraries: Scalatra Akka Scala Cats Flask Pandas NumPy Vue.js Ramda.js * Datastores: Postgres Redis AWS DynamoDB AWS Neptune RabbitMQ * Infrastructure: AWS and Docker'
column10: b'No'
column14: b"Here are things that we think lead to being a successful engineering co-op at Blackfynn: * You're a generalist who is curious. * You're not afraid of new technologies and love to learn how best to wield them. * You\xe2\x80\x99re mindful of performance and trade-offs in your work. * You're data driven and measure results to help guide your efforts. * You constantly seek out opportunities to automate processes and tasks. * You're eager to review peer code and have your code reviewed. * You're team focused care about engineering culture and don't have an ego."
column15: b'No Restriction'
column16: b'Intermediate - Some related work or volunteer experience/second Co-op or Advanced - Previous related work experience/final Co-op'

column1: Cardiology Consultants of Philadelphia (63566) Hiring Office Location: Philadelphia
column9: b'The Mission of CCP is to improve the health of our patients through the provision of the most comprehensive cardiovascular care research and education possible. We strive to continuously advance our relevant knowledge in order to improve the service we provide to our patients referring physicians and community. We are committed to forging longstanding relationships with our patients referring physicians shareholders and employees. We adhere to prudent business practices to ensure the long-term fiscal health of our organization.We are affiliated with virtually every major hospital in the region and serve patients from offices in all five Southeastern Pennsylvania counties. In keeping with our deep Philadelphia roots we prize our independence which gives us the freedom to partner with many institutions and to refer our patients to those which are most appropriate for their care.'
column10: b'Primary Function: This position will include assist with programmatic and reporting needs of the CCP\xe2\x80\x99s clinical applications interface and IT environment. This includes creating and publishing reports using appropriate analytic tools and SQL. Additionally the position will support business users and developers with data analysis data integrations and creation of new automated processes. This position will also assist with efforts to automate workflows using Javascript as well. A strong SQL and programming background is preferred. Responsibilities: Key responsibilities include but are not limited to: \xe2\x80\xa2Create and publish reports using reporting and analytic tools (or custom SQL) to meet ad-hoc and ongoing internal requests. \xe2\x80\xa2Analyze and document existing databases and business processes to identify data available for reporting and analytics. Interpret and transform business requirements into a cohesive reporting solution. \xe2\x80\xa2Identify data integrity issues through validation of existing data and audit of processes that populate those databases. \xe2\x80\xa2Support business users developers DBAs with data analysis data integrations enhancement of existing processes and development of new processes. \xe2\x80\xa2Provide training on corporate reporting and analytics tools to internal users to support self-service reporting. \xe2\x80\xa2Evaluate and integrate reporting and analytics solutions. \xe2\x80\xa2Assist as needed with data analysis and cleaning activities to ensure data consistency integrity and further automation of procedures. \xe2\x80\xa2Proactively works with clients and other technical support staff to resolve appropriate issues. \xe2\x80\xa2Develop scripts for consistent and secure execution of common tasks \xe2\x80\xa2Proactively raises issues if specifications architecture or implementation strategies will lead to quality or system performance issues or problems. \xe2\x80\xa2Participates in technical design reviews functional specification reviews and contributes to ongoing project estimates scheduling test plans and code reviews. \xe2\x80\xa2Demonstrates self-directed and proactive approach to tackling problems and leveraging resources consistent with the overall goals of a project \xe2\x80\xa2Demonstrates self-directed and proactive approach to tackling problems and leveraging resources consistent with the overall goals of the organization. \xe2\x80\xa2This individual may also be called upon to perform projects and other activities by management.'
column15: b'Requirements: \xe2\x80\xa2Ability to travel to site locations with personal vehicle. Legal and up- to- date Driver\xe2\x80\x99s license is required. \xe2\x80\xa2Excellent SQL skills \xe2\x80\xa2Experience with reporting tools (e.g. Crystal Reports ) business intelligence tools (Business Objects Brio etc) data related products: databases (MySQL SQL Server Oracle SQL Developer SQL PLUS) \xe2\x80\xa2Experience with large data volumes. \xe2\x80\xa2Excellent analytical process and problem-solving skills. \xe2\x80\xa2Strong interpersonal presentation communication skills organized with attention to detail. \xe2\x80\xa2Experience implementing operational and analytical reporting solutions \xe2\x80\xa2Excellent understanding of reporting solution concepts and strategies \xe2\x80\xa2General data warehousing technical knowledge with an emphasis on SQL & data quality. \xe2\x80\xa2Protection Switches Routers and Firewalls. This position interfaces with end users. Individual must have excellent written and verbal communication skills must be self-directed confident and able to work independently or as part of a team. The Position requires strong problem solving skills. \xe2\x80\xa2This position also has responsibility for documenting and assisting with windows domain operational policy and procedures. This individual will be assist with daily administration of the windows platform Supported Technologies include Powershell & Windows Command Line Scripting Microsoft SQL JavaScript BASH \xe2\x80\xa2This individual should have a high level of technical ability and be able to work in a fast-paced environment. A team-oriented individual with good oral and written skills is required for this position. \xe2\x80\xa2This individual may also be called upon to perform projects and other activities by management \xe2\x80\xa2Helpful: Hands-on experience with the following technologies: o Crystal Reports o MySQL o Microsoft SQL o SQL Plus o JavaScript o Oracle Databases (Oracle SQL Developer) o Citrix experience preferred o EMR/EHR support experience preferred Other Functions and Competencies: \xe2\x80\xa2Must be able to sit for prolonged periods of time in front of a computer. Must have an even temperament. \xe2\x80\xa2Individual must have excellent written and verbal communication skills must be self-directed confident and able to work independently or as part of a team. The Position requires strong problem solving skills. \xe2\x80\xa2In addition to Windows technology experience this individual should have a working knowledge of TCP/IP network environments. \xe2\x80\xa2This individual should have a high level of technical ability and be able to work in a fast-paced environment. A team-oriented individual with good oral and written skills is required for this position. Educational/Training Requirements: Working towards an Associate\xe2\x80\x99s or Bachelor\xe2\x80\x99s Degree in computer science or related field.'

column1: ECFMG (Educational Commission for Foreign Medical Graduates) (49467) Hiring Office Location: Philadelphia
column9: b"ECFMG evaluates the qualifications of graduates of international medical schools who seek entry into residency or fellowship programs in the United States that are accredited by the Accreditation Council for Graduate Medical Education (ACGME). International medical graduates who wish to enter such programs must be certified by ECFMG. The current requirements for ECFMG Certification include passing the Step 1 and 2 examinations of the three-step United States Medical Licensing Examination\xc2\xae (USMLE\xc2\xae) ECFMG employs more than 800 people between its headquarters in Philadelphia; its non- profit foundation the Foundation for Advancement of International Medical Education and Research (FAIMER) also headquartered in Philadelphia; and the Clinical Skills Evaluation Collaboration (CSEC) Centers in Philadelphia Atlanta Chicago Houston and Los Angeles. ECFMG values the accumulated knowledge and experience of these employees and recognizes that they are integral to the success of ECFMG and its mission to promote quality healthcare for the public through excellence in medical education. Their daily dedication and their commitment to the organization's core values make possible the success of ECFMG's many initiatives for the international medical community. In recognition of the value of its employees ECFMG strives to offer excellent benefits and an environment that emphasizes professional development and personal wellness."
column10: b'The Mobile Software Development Co-Op is responsible for contributing to a Scrum team that is building and delivering software to ECFMG end users and external clients using HTML5 CSS3 jQuery jQuery Mobile Twitter Bootstrap AngularJS and PhoneGap. The successful candidate will be exposed to all facets of our Agile software development life cycle. The student will develop automated unit tests in a test driven development environment deploy working software into a test environment and help to assess the quality of deliverables through manual and automated test scripts; assist in the development of deployment instructions and provide production support. The student may also assist in the re-engineering of legacy applications. The objective of the Co-Op experience at ECFMG is to expose the student to all aspects of professional software development.'

column10: b'In this position you will assist the Nursing Practice Specialist for Informatics with work related to the support of nurses who use a clinical computer system to perform their work. column9: b'The applicant will be employed as an Engineering Assistant in the Water Accountability Unit. Their main assignment will be assisting the unit in projects that promote efficiency and accountability in the water delivery and billing processes which are necessary in reducing non-revenue water. The applicant will work under close supervision of an engineer while being trained and gradually work more independently as his or her knowledge and technical skills increase. This is a newer unit within Philadelphia Water and those with an entrepreneurial spirit will find themselves at home. The selected applicant will be exposed to many levels in the planning and implementation of processes that promote Water Accountability. The applicant will be responsible for the performance of varied tasks which may include: \xe2\x80\xa2Assisting engineers in the specification and piloting of an Advanced Metering Infrastructure (AMI) System. \xe2\x80\xa2Testing analysis and diagnosing of the current equipment used to test and measure customer consumption. \xe2\x80\xa2 Compiling analyzing and interpreting large quantities of data to support programs that promote water efficiency . \xe2\x80\xa2 Work with and provide assistance to other units within the Operations Division as necessary.'

column1: Brandywine Global Investment Management
column10: b"Located a few blocks from Drexel's campus and founded in 1986 Brandywine Global Investment Management LLC (Brandywine Global) is a boutique investment management firm that offers fixed income equity and balanced investment solutions. The firm currently manages $77 billion in assets and is a wholly owned independently operated subsidiary of Legg Mason Inc. (NYSE: LM) headquartered in Philadelphia with offices in London Montreal San Francisco Singapore and Toronto. Brandywine Global\xe2\x80\x99s mission is to deliver superior investment solutions and performance for their clients. To attain this mission they listen to their clients aim to hire support and retain the industry's best people encourage independent thinking by sponsoring an open marketplace for ideas promote a culture of integrity and partnership and find value throughout the world which others have not yet recognized. Our firm is in the Cira Center which has a cafeteria gym and shuttle with stops around center city."
column11: b'You will be a part of the team - discussing projects writing code showing your work to the team working with users etc. Our recent co-ops have been working with AngularJs D3 ASP.NET WebAPI SQL Server etc plus DevOps type projects such as GIT. The specific technology depends on your skills and the available projects but we use a variety of platforms databases and languages (mostly but not always the Microsoft stack). You can expect to leave your co-op with experience building UIs creating web services making database calls and more. You will work independently on projects but always have the support of the team. The types of projects are high value to our business and relate to finance and investments. You will have additional assignments related to learning such as technical workshops financial presentations or other research. Co-ops often help with other items such as interviewing the next set of co-ops and even full time employees. We will give you a personal mentor to help answer questions and work with you while at the firm. Essential Job Functions Contribute to Agile and/or software development life cycle (initiation requirements design development testing and deployment). Implement solutions in various technologies such as .NET SQL HTML Python or others. Interact with all levels of users including the business and IT to get requirements. Multi-task varying business requests / projects in a changing environment. Work independently but ask for help from mentors and the team when needed. Contribute to team discussions brainstorming and solutioning and share ideas and experience. Other duties as assigned.'

column1: BAYADA Home Health Care
column10: b'BAYADA Home Health Care is a trusted leader in providing clinical care and support services at home for children and adults of all ages. Since 1975 company founder Mark Baiada has been at the forefront of the home health care movement \xe2\x80\x94 working to give people greater access to high-quality care that helps them live safely at home. Over the years this effort has attracted other like-minded care professionals who have helped shape and grow BAYADA. Today our team includes more than 18000 home health care professionals serving their communities in 22 states from more than 350 offices. BAYADA specialty practices include Home Health Adult Nursing Assistive Care Pediatrics Hospice and Habilitation. While we are a large group representing many care disciplines all BAYADA professionals share the same commitment to one unique philosophy: We believe our clients and their families deserve home health care delivered with compassion excellence and reliability.'

column9: b'At Siemens Healthineers we are passionate about enabling healthcare professionals to deliver high quality patient care and to do so affordably. column10: b'This co-op position is in Digital Health Services\xe2\x80\x99 Product Security team and is an excellent opportunity to be part of an experienced R&D team creating workflow products and advanced clinical image analysis tools for the largest hospitals in the world. Do you have a passion for offensive security; find yourself competing in collegiate cyber events? Have the drive to deep dive into real world threat emulation using the latest toolsets? If so an internship with Siemens Healthineers will give you the experience needed to start your career The successful candidate will be comfortable working in a fast-paced collaborative and global environment and have a strong ability to foster partnerships across many different organizations. The person filling this position must be hands-on proactive self-motivated and committed. This position will report to the Product and Solution Security Officer for Digital Health Services but will be expected to work with and take direction from senior level engineers and project managers.'

In this role you will learn how to create data for machine learning how to train AI algorithms for applications in the field of radiology working on both medical imaging and natural language processing. You will learn exciting new technologies including deep learning as well as how to carry out experiments and to evaluate results of new algorithms. You are also expected to participate in seminars where state-of-the-art papers regarding machine learning are introduced. The successful candidate will be comfortable working in a fast-paced collaborative and global environment and have a strong ability to foster partnerships across many different organizations. The person filling this position must be hands-on proactive self-motivated and committed. The intern will report to the advising scientist but will be expected to work with and take direction from other scientists.'

column1: Thomas Jefferson University Hospital (5039) Hiring Office Location: Philadelphia
column9: b'Jefferson is an academic medical center that includes Thomas Jefferson University and Jefferson Health. With the commitment of more than 23000 employees we provide exceptional patient care deliver breakthrough research and educate the professionals of tomorrow who will build the future of work the future of health care and the future of education. World-renowned for advancing groundbreaking developments in healthcare education and research since 1824 Thomas Jefferson University is composed of the Sidney Kimmel Medical College (formerly known as Jefferson Medical College) and the Colleges of Biomedical Sciences Health Professions Nursing Pharmacy and Population Health. Each year our nationally recognized faculty who lead a number of programs boasting U.S. News & World Report recognition educate more than 4000 students and set the highest standards of healthcare education to prepare them to lead change and succeed throughout their careers. Jefferson Health our clinical arm provides a broad range of primary and complex highly specialized care. Through our nine hospitals (three are Magnet\xc2\xae-designated and recognized for nursing excellence by the ANCC) more than 30 outpatient and urgent care locations and our NCI- designated Sidney Kimmel Cancer Center we deliver an exceptional experience to nearly two million inpatient and outpatients annually. U.S. News & World Report has ranked Thomas Jefferson University Hospital among the best in the nation in 11 specialties and high performing in two more. We are ranked second in the Philadelphia metro area and third in Pennsylvania for the quality of care we provide. As an employer Jefferson maintains a commitment to provide equal access to employment. Jefferson values diversity and encourages applications from women members of minority groups LGBTQ individuals disabled individuals and veterans.'

column9: b'Our business is built on a spirit of growth and innovation. With each new product released the HomeSource team has maintained a singular vision: to make life simpler for retailers and manufacturers by aggregating large amounts of data into one single usable system. Today that vision is blending with new cloud technology in ways that would have seemed impossible even a few years ago. It is now possible to bring together millions of pieces of information \xe2\x80\x93 including item numbers product specs training videos and more \xe2\x80\x93 into an app that can be used and updated in real-time. The result isn\xe2\x80\x99t just useful it\xe2\x80\x99s groundbreaking. Our proprietary software makes it possible for retailers to print customized quotes and manuals for customers on an on-demand basis. It lets them give accurate shipping times and lets them generate collateral materials like signage or rebate forms in moments. It allows manufacturers to update sizes colors and options instantaneously so dealers always have current and accurate information at their fingertips. It even allows for improved e-commerce and in-store marketing materials.'

column8: b"Night Kitchen Interactive is a Philadelphia-based design studio that creates digital solutions for museums and arts and cultural organizations. Our office is located in a charming three-story building formerly a Victorian candy store in Philadelphia's lively Fishtown neighborhood. The Girard MFL stop and Girard trolley are located conveniently nearby. We\xe2\x80\x99re also a short walk from several restaurants bars and cafes (including Frankfort Hall Barcade and La Colombe) an assortment of music venues and galleries record stores and antique shops and other cool neighborhood accoutrements. We share the space with a vintage furniture mogul who owns a showroom on the first floor and two very friendly cats who may try to sit on your keyboard. We regularly bake artisan bread and the fridge is stocked for the occasional end-of-day breather. Come join our team work hard develop cool interactive projects and enjoy the occasional Friday off!"

column1: PJM Interconnection LLC (4021) Hiring Office Location: Norristown PA (1)
column8: b'Company Description: PJM Interconnection is a regional transmission organization (RTO) that plays a vital role in the U.S. electric system. PJM ensures the reliability of the largest centrally dispatched control area in North America by coordinating the movement of electricity in all or parts of 13 states. PJM acting neutrally and independently operates the largest competitive wholesale electricity market in the world. PJM manages a sophisticated regional planning process for generation and transmission expansion to assure future electric reliability. PJM facilitates a collaborative stakeholder process. Stakeholders include participants that produce buy sell move and regulate electricity. Department Description: The Information Technology Corporate Applications Department is responsible for the development and maintenance of corporate applications such as the external site PJM.com the PJM intranet and SharePoint. This student will assist the Corporate Applications Solutions Team with enhancements maintenance and support of the many applications that the team owns.'
column9: b'Essential duties and responsibilities include: \xe2\x80\xa2 Support of PJM.com and many PJM-related Web sites and applications. \xe2\x80\xa2 Resolve diverse issues from internal and external customers. \xe2\x80\xa2 Investigate new tools to solve complex business needs. \xe2\x80\xa2 Support of various Web functions. \xe2\x80\xa2 Follow all PJM policies standard and procedures as relates to job functionality and corporate responsibilities. Assist with the following: \xe2\x80\xa2 New application and site creation on the PJM intranet and SharePoint environment \xe2\x80\xa2 Updating documentation for all processes and procedures handled the Corporate Applications Solutions Team. Please note that this session runs from 9/24/2018 until 3/29/2019. If you cannot commit to employment for the session in its entirety and/or need to end the session earlier than the end date of 3/29/2019 please DO NOT apply.'

column8: b'About Radian: Headquartered in Philadelphia Radian connects lenders home buyers investors and loan servicers using a suite of private mortgage insurance and related risk management products and services. column1: RevZilla (63486) Hiring Office Location: Philadelphia
column9: b"RevZilla is a fast-growing Philadelphia-based retailer bringing the best possible shopping experience to every motorcycle enthusiast. Founded in 2007 on a strong technology backbone our core focus is on our eCommerce business and delivering superior customer service. RevZilla.com is one of the dominant players in the North American Motorcycle Market as well as the industry leader in how-to review and lifestyle content for buying motorcycle gear online. Don't take our word for it--RevZilla's been recognized as IT Innovator of the Year named one of PA and Philly's Best Places to Work and rated Elite by StellaService (in the top 10 retailers). RevZilla also has close ties to Drexel with two of the founders--Anthony Bucci and Nick Auger--among Drexel\xe2\x80\x99s 40-under-40 as well as a number of other Drexel alumni on the team."
column10: b"RevZilla is committed to providing an immersive learning experience that takes students out of the confines of a cubicle and straight into projects working side by side with some of the brightest talent in the tech and marketing space. Our team hails from Google Urban Outfitters QVC NFL Lockheed Martin and Comcast among many others - not only will you learn from the best in the eCommerce space you'll have an awesome time doing it! RevZilla caters lunch every Tuesday and regularly gets the whole team together whether it's for a Two-Wheel Tuesday post-work party ZillaPalooza (our zany spirit week) during the summer our insane holiday party in the winter or any one of our individual team nights out and regular opportunities to give back to the community you'll find that when you're here you're more than just our Co-Op you're truly one of us. A Co-Op with Revzilla will not just give you the tools to succeed in the classroom once your time with us comes to an end it may even result in joining us full time! Fun fact: many of our co-ops have gone on to join our team full time once they've graduated! Are you ready to jump start your career at one of Philly's Top Workplaces? We're ready for you! RevZilla is seeking our next Digital Marketing Co-op. We are on a quest for moto dominance and need someone who hustles by default sweats the numbers and is exceptionally detail-oriented to support the team in making their marketing visions a reality. Working with the Retention Marketing team this position will be responsible for the execution of Marketing efforts across a mix of channels (including potentially: Social Marketing Email Marketing and Digital Merchandising). We\xe2\x80\x99re looking for someone who is interested in tackling exciting challenges learning new technology and making strategic ecomm marketing decisions. We are looking for a motivated co-op interested in E-commerce and online marketing likely pursuing a major in: Marketing (especially Interactive and New Media); Customer Analytics; Data Science; Business Analytics; Mathematics. column9: b"Company Overview: Macquarie Group is a leading provider of financial advisory investment and funds management services. Working with traders and quants our systems engineers network architects technical analysts and software developers create industry-leading technical solutions. Our over 750 technologists are quick-thinking open- minded able to execute on ideas and committed to innovation. We use an iterative and agile approach testing and improving our ideas along the way. Our engineers and developers focus on the entire technology stack always with an eye towards evolving a stable scalable optimized technology environment with minimized risk.
